about_the_game:
Despite common belief, eternal peace does not reign in Heaven, and with each growing day, angels continue to find fault in their Eden. Raised above hellfire and below the bellowing bellies of serpents, the celestial world is no stranger to peril. See through the eyes of Archangel Gabriel as he traverses the three realms in a tale of estrangement and fear told through intricate, handmade artistry and creative storytelling. Navigate choices both promising and cursed to deliver desired endings and peculiar secrets as you uncover the convoluted mysteries of this world.

The Story



Making a deal with the Devil is never an easy feat; even more, it's a lesson hard learned.
After having lost his wings in a terrible error, Gabriel sets out to hunt down Lucifer, his childhood friend, to force him to atone for his crimes against the Father. In times of devastation, join the story as the archangel struggles between his obligation and past, and decide his verdict for him. In each story, familiarize yourself with leagues of archangels, legions of demons, and clamors of fearful humans. The Heavens are falling; the choice is yours.

And the Features



Traverse three different storylines as you explore EBBIL’s diverse universe, are introduced to its compelling characters, and make decisions that impact your journey. Developed with simplicity in mind, EBBIL provides an easy-to-access yet captivating story, containing precise chapter selection and multiple save files in a kinetic style. With its simple user-friendly interface, beautiful art, animated scenes, and original OST, immersion is unbroken. As you’re left with smooth sailing, allow yourself to enjoy the intrigue and mystique of the story with no difficulty.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of violance, psychological and physiological horror as well as flashing lights and photosensitive imagery. Viewer Discretion is highly adviced!

short_description: In Heaven, mistakes have been made. In this story inspired by TMC, follow Archangel Gabriel through a trial of corruption and feigned purity as he explores celestial realms and the rekindling of lost friendships. Will you save the Heavens, or will you see them fall?
